short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare IKEA product prices across different country websites. Currently works for Czechia only, more countries coming soon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the best deals on IKEA products across different countries with IKEA Price Scout. This powerful Chrome extension helps you compare prices and potentially save money on your IKEA purchases.

Key Features:

- Automatically compares product prices across multiple IKEA country websites
- Displays price differences directly on product pages for easy comparison
- Provides a comprehensive summary in your shopping cart, showing potential savings
- Suggests the optimal purchasing strategy to maximise your savings
- Updates in real-time as you modify your cart

Why use IKEA Price Scout?

- Save Money: Identify the best country to purchase each item, potentially saving significant amounts on larger orders
- Save Time: No need to manually check multiple IKEA websites - our extension does it for you
- Make Informed Decisions: Get all the pricing information you need right where you shop
- Optimise Your Cart: See at a glance how to distribute your purchases for maximum savings

Currently working in Czechia, with plans to expand to other countries soon. IKEA Price Scout is the perfect tool for savvy shoppers who want to get the most value out of their IKEA purchases.

Start scouting for the best IKEA deals today!

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by IKEA. Prices are converted to your local currency for easy comparison.
